sentences.en: A pale reddish glow lit the sky.
sentences.cn: 略带红色的淡淡光辉照亮了天空。

sentences.en: Blue suit and reddish - brown socks! He had fouled up again.
sentences.cn: 蓝衣服和 红褐色 短袜! 他又搞错了.

sentences.en: He dressed carefully in the reddish - brown suit he had been married in.
sentences.cn: 他小心翼翼地穿上他结婚时穿过的 红褐色 西服.

sentences.en: He stained the wood reddish - brown .
sentences.cn: 他给木头涂上了 红褐色.

sentences.en: He stirred the coffee until it was a light reddish - brown .
sentences.cn: 直到咖啡成 红褐色,他才停止搅拌.

sentences.en: He threw out his old suits, all in shades of grey and reddish - brown .
sentences.cn: 他把那些灰色和 红褐色 的旧西服都扔掉了.

sentences.en: Her eyes were a little hollow, and reddish about the rims.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛微微凹陷, 眼眶有些发红.

sentences.en: Her reddish hair was cut short and neatly combed.
sentences.cn: 她淡红色的头发剪得短短的，梳得很整齐。

sentences.en: In 1664 Hooke observed a reddish spot on the surface of the planet.
sentences.cn: 1664年，胡克注意到这颗行星表面有一块微红的斑点。

sentences.en: Leaves will usually have a cooked appearance, with dark brown, reddish lesions.
sentences.cn: 叶子常呈火烧状, 暗棕色, 红色的病痕.

sentences.en: Normally tan to reddish sandstones are bleached.
sentences.cn: 黄褐色至浅红色的砂岩通常是褪色的.

sentences.en: The woman busily collected the ripened reddish berries.
sentences.cn: 那妇女忙着采集成熟的淡红色的莓果.

sentences.en: They're collecting the ripened reddish berries.
sentences.cn: 他们正采集熟了的淡红草莓.

sentences.en: This lesion enlarged progressively and showed a reddish , elevated , dome - shaped surface.
sentences.cn: 病灶之病理切片报告为粘液性癌.

trans.tran_cn: 淡红色的，微红的，混有或染有红色的
